content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s cashmere merino bloom 1 75% extra fine merino wool and 25% cashmere we used the color honey pink - us 5 3 75 mm straight or circular needles 2 gauge - 20 stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch - 48 row 24 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size - circumference around top edge approximately 20 inches - circumference around bottom edge approximately 29 inches - height approximately 10 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/cashmere-merino-bloom html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
